Key Match Events: Chicago White Sox scored 5 runs in the 9th inning to avoid a series sweep with a 7-2 comeback win over the Red Sox
Others: Chris Flexen's winless streak extended to 21 straight starts, the longest in team history
The White Sox had lost his previous 20 starts, which is a major league record
The MLB-worst White Sox are nine losses away from tying the 1962 New York Mets for the most losses since 1900
